column2: Job Title: Customer Service Representative/Shift Manager Location: BEYONDBURG INC, BANGALORE, KOCHI AND CALICUT Job Type: Full-time Job Summary: We are looking for a friendly and customer-focused individual to join our team as a Customer Service Representative at [Restaurant Name]. The Customer Service Representative will be responsible for providing exceptional service to our guests, taking orders accurately, and ensuring a positive dining experience for all customers. The ideal candidate should have strong communication skills, a passion for hospitality, and a desire to create memorable moments for our guests. Responsibilities: Greet customers as they enter the restaurant with a warm and friendly demeanor. Assist guests in making menu selections and provide recommendations when requested. Take food and beverage orders from customers accurately and efficiently, using our POS system. Communicate orders to the kitchen and bar staff promptly and ensure timely delivery of food and drinks to customers' tables. Address any customer inquiries or concerns in a professional and courteous manner, and escalate issues to management when necessary. Maintain cleanliness and organization in the dining area, including clearing and resetting tables as needed. Process payments from customers and handle cash and credit card transactions securely. Collaborate with other staff members to ensure smooth operation during peak dining hours. Stay updated on menu items, specials, and promotions to provide accurate information to customers. Assist with other duties as assigned by the Restaurant Manager or Supervisor. Implementation of Standard Operations Procedures. Qualifications: Previous experience in customer service or hospitality is preferred but not required. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with customers and colleagues. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed. Positive attitude and a passion for providing exceptional customer service. Basic math skills for processing payments accurately. Knowledge of food safety and sanitation practices is a plus. Benefits: Competitive pay based on experience and qualifications. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within the company. Employee discounts on food and beverages. A supportive and inclusive work environment focused on teamwork and collaboration. Annaul Leaves, Incentives as per the company KPIs.
